rComments: Pizzuti is really cute and very nice. Her class is really easy if you do the essays and show improvement. She'll make you turn in all the rough drafts with the final draft.Your writing will improve.  Cons are that she can go the whole class time lecturing nonstop and can be a super feminist. I felt bad for the guys in my class.

Pizzuti is an awesome professor! She truely cares about her students and gives a lot of extra credit if you write poetry or exceptionally good writing essays. I got an A, but you have to work for it. Go to Office Hours and bs a poem and you're all set! there is a lot of reading though, so don't fall behind! Enjoy!! ;]
Great professor, she is nice and very helpful. She is cares for her students, and is of great help. My writing improved thanks to her, readings are manageable. Would definitely recommend her.
she is very nice. thats not the problem. basically the writing tutor is who really helps in your writing

she is a really nice teacher. she is a sweet little old lady. if you know how to bs then you can get through the discussions on the reading, as long as you know the main idea of the reading. her essays are somewhat easy but if you like to write then its all good for you. unfortunately she doesnt leave many comments on papers or corrections
